name: Align Technology, Inc.
description: Align Technology, Inc. is a global leader in the medical device industry, specializing in the design and manufacture of innovative orthodontic and restorative products. Founded in 1997, Align is best known for its revolutionary Invisalign system, which utilizes advanced 3D computer graphics technology to create customized, clear aligners that are an alternative to traditional metal braces. The company is committed to transforming the orthodontic experience by offering solutions that are not only aesthetically pleasing but also comfortable and effective. Beyond Invisalign, Align Technology also offers a range of dental products including the iTero intraoral scanner, which enhances the digital workflow for dental professionals. With a focus on research and development, Align continually strives to improve its product offerings and expand its global presence, serving both orthodontists and general dentists. Align Technology's mission is to improve the quality of life through better smiles, and the company actively promotes education and training for dental professionals. As of today, Align is recognized as a pioneer in the digital orthodontics space, making significant contributions to the advancement of dental technology.
